name: Axiom-Reign of Archus
description:
A short 2D game involving the new King of the Geomet, Archus, and his job as monarch. He will be tasked with making various decisions that will impact the ending of the run.

Made within two or so months by me. Developed all art, sounds, story, and code for the game. Currently a working prototype. Unsure if it will be completed or not.
